## Details

<p>An action link appears as a link in your app and has a value that increments each time the user presses the button. </p>

<p>Follow these steps to add an action link to your app:</p>

<ol>
  <li>
  Add `ui.input_action_link()` to the UI of your app to create the action link. Where you call this function will determine where the link will appear within the layout of the app.
  </li>
  <li>
  Access the value of your action link with `input.action_link._value`. The server value of an action link is an integer representing the number of clicks. 
  </li>
</ol>
